title: GGEZ to something funny
body:
Just like blizzard did in overwatch, i get sick of seeing it even if regardless of whuch team it is and they fed/trolled/afk EtC that game

ty in advance

Edit: filter other toxicity too, just for the lols

replies.body: The idea is good in theory, but in reality people would just spam it to hear funny shit, and then it just makes more people say it.
It doesn't matter if it's spammed, because people will just see the funny quotes instead of GGEZ.
Sure, but spam of any kind is still annoying.
fuck off. get some thicker skin.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0EtOsph9,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-08-26T02:07:22.301+0000)
>
> fuck off. get some thicker skin.

This.
It's not offensive, just harden up.
make them not get the ip from the game :P
I like this, I'm upvoting it. Maybe with enough upvotes Riot will see it and act on it.
